ygData.subject: something i found
ygData.msgSnippet: i was looking through some of my links on enchanter sites when i found this passage In other news: Yes, the new jewelry patch is everything we could have
ygData.messageBody:
i was looking through some of my links on enchanter sites when i found this passage

"In other news: Yes, the new jewelry patch is everything we could have asked for, BUT. I highly recommend you be careful selling and crafting items. Magical items crafted under the new patch WILL vanish if you enter certain zones. Qnos is one of these areas, I have no doubt there are others. Craft at your own risk, and I do advise you notify everyone you sell to to be careful where they go."


this is disturbing news, and perhaps a flaw? or not true, has anyone experienced this problem? or know anything about it?

-Aeramus 16th Enchanter on Bristlebane
